author: Staff Reporter
text:
Around 40 members of a self-help group on Thursday thronged Vadamadurai police station, demanding action against a person who has been torturing his wife for the past one year.

They said that one Gurunathan married Chandra, an SHG member, 10 years ago, and the couple had two girl children. Gurunathan married another woman last year without informing Ms. Chandra and started torturing her, they claimed.

Ms. Chandra lodged a complaint with Vadamadurai police station last year. But no action had been taken against her husband or her in-laws to date, they said. The women demanded criminal action against Gurunathan and his family members.
title: SHG members demand action against man
